article_title: Israel warns Hezbollah and Lebanon over border fighting
sentence: On  the  Israeli  side,  at  least  four  civilians  and  nine  soldiers  are  known  to  have  died  on  the  Lebanon  border  since  hostilities  began.

article_title: Israel warns Hezbollah and Lebanon over border fighting
sentence: Hezbollah's  leadership  praised  the  unprecedented  cross-border  attack  launched  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  at  least  1,200  people  were  killed  -  most  of  them  civilians  -  and  about  240  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel warns Hezbollah and Lebanon over border fighting
sentence: More  than  21,100  people  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  forces  in  Gaza  -  mostly  children  and  women  -  during  11  weeks  of  fighting,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
